meta.reasoning: Investigated why hooks weren't auto-creating sessions. Discovered this is by design - hooks handle compact continuity, not session creation. Added auto-detection script to ~/.config/zshrc/40-empirica. Session now loads automatically on shell start. Uncertainty remains around whether compact hooks will work correctly (untested).
